providing key details of the work performed, including results and
conclusions.
\end{abstract}

\markright{TEAM 463}

A restatement and clarification of the problem as interpreted by the
team.

Some previous work here.

An explanation of all assumptions and approximations made.

Justification for all work performed, as well as a discussion of the
strengths and weaknesses of the approach taken.


\section{Conclusions}

\label{conclusions} We worked hard, and achieved very little. \cite{Gil:02}

\section{Appendix}

Any computer programs written may be included as an appendix to the
paper, however all algorithms, methods and results must be included
in the main text of the paper to receive consideration during judging.
